alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Coastal Pender; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern New Hanover, Pender, southeastern Bladen, northeastern Brunswick and east central Columbus Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1229 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ashton, or near Burgaw, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, Surf City, Hampstead, Northwest, Sandyfield, Point Caswell, Long Creek, Cape Fear Community College North Campus, Ashton, Rocky Point, Murrayville, Currie, Castle Hayne, Wards Corner, The Borough, Phoenix, Scotts Hill, Riegelwood, Woodside and White Stocking. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 396 and 416. Interstate 140 between mile markers 15 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bladen; Coastal Pender; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
